article_title: Chan Zuckerberg Initiative commits $25 million to a fund researching COVID-19 treatments
article_description: The Chan Zuckerberg Initiative has committed  25 million to a research fund designed to help identify and develop treatments for the disease caused by the novel coronavirus
article_content: The Gates Foundation has committed  50 million to the fund Photo by Johannes Simon Getty Images The Chan Zuckerberg Initiative  CZI  Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerbergs philanthropic arm  has committed  25 million to a research fund designed to help identify and   2361 chars
